author: jbeard
msg: Updated the options that the compiler is able to take. --ie now aliases only to noIndexOf

author: jbeard
msg: Changed noIndexOf so that it does not add alter Array.prototype, but instead provides a function indexOf as a private method in the statechart constructor function.

author: jbeard
msg: Updated unit tests not to use Array.map internally.

author: jbeard
msg: Removed reference to Array.some in favor of for loop.
